CustomField.description: Billing Amount is calculated as Billing Quantity * Net Rate. Billing Amount is rounded up to 2 decimals and adjustments to match the Sales Order Total are applied on the last period
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Billing Amount is calculated as Billing Quantity * Net Rate. Billing Amount is rounded up to 2 decimals and adjustments to match the Sales Order Total are applied on the last period
CustomField.label: Billing Amount
